name: SpaceGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this skill you can take part in a mission with a real spaceship! Study your surroundings and hit the elements around you to reach the goal as soon as possible!

You can watch
- The sky
- The terrain

You can move
- back
- on

Spaceship weapons
- Radar
- Laser Beam

For exampe
"Alexa, use the radar"
"Alexa, move back"
"Alexa, move on
"Alexa, see the sky"
"Alexa, use the laser beam"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
